name: James Stewart Movies Online Quiz | People Themed | 10 Questions

questions.text: Stewart starred in 'The Monty Stratton Story'. Who was Monty Stratton?
questions.explanation:
Ballplayer.

	Basebll pitcher, injured in hunting accident.

questions.text: Stewart also starred in 'Anatomy of A Murder'. Who was the woman star that played the crime victim?
Which musical legend was portrayed by Stewart?
questions.explanation:
Glenn Miller.

	Steve Allen was {Goodman;} Kirk Douglas was Bix (in 'Young Man With A Horn'). I think Sal Mineo played Krupa.

questions.text: Stewart's best western was 'Broken Arrow'. It also gave Jeff Chandler one of his best roles as this Indian leader.
Stewart had a role as Buttons, the clown, in 'the Greatest Show on Earth'. Who played the aerialist?
questions.explanation:
Cornel Wilde.

	Roland played that type of role in 'The Big Circus', Curtis and Lancaster were aerial performers in 'Trapeze'.

questions.text: Which of the following is a James Stewart comedy?
questions.explanation:
Dear Brigitte.

	'Year' was Peter O'Toole, 'Furlough' was Tony Curtis (and Janet Leigh), 'Sunday' was Rod Taylor (and Jane Fonda).

questions.text: Stewart made several movies with Hitchcock. Which of the following was one of them?
Which of the following Stewart westerns also starred John Wayne?
Which of the following is NOT a movie that stars Stewart?
questions.explanation:
Mirage.

	'Mirage' is Gregory Peck. '777' is a good drama, 'FBI' is an old-fashioned tribute, 'Phoenix' is an adventure story.

questions.text: Stewart was one of the stars of 'The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance'. Who played Liberty?
